description: Michael Bluth's (Jason Bateman) eccentric family suffers a reversal of fortune. With Portia de Rossi, Jeffrey Tambor and David Cross.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael searches for paperwork to keep the family business afloat; George-Michael manages the banana stand.
title: arrested-development

description: George-Michael tries out for the school play to get closer to Maeby; Gob breaks up with his girlfriend and has nowhere to go.
title: arrested-development

description: Busy Gob asks Michael to escort his girlfriend to an awards show; Lucille runs into her rival (Liza Minnelli).
title: arrested-development

description: Gob and Lindsay accuse Michael of being cold and uncharitable; Lindsay volunteers herself at a bachelorette auction to raise money for charity.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael tries to get information out of his father during a visit with him in prison; Lucille and George share a conjugal visit; Maeby's parents' relationship is on the rocks.
title: arrested-development

description: Lucille turns Michael and Lindsay against each other; George-Michael impresses Maeby with a manly costume he dons for a charity event; Buster's torrid affair with his mother's nemesis (Liza Minnelli) causes distress.
title: arrested-development

description: As a birthday treat, Michael permits his mother to drive the Bluth truck; Buster and Lucille 2 go on their first date; George-Michael and Maeby try to sneak into an R-rated movie.
title: arrested-development

description: When Michael devises a plan to break up Gob and Marta, he realizes he cannot go through with it; Lucille tries to come to terms with Buster's new romance; George Sr. finds religion while in solitary confinement.
title: arrested-development

description: Lindsay tells Michael he has been pushing George-Michael too hard; Buster tries to score some marijuana for Lucille 2's vertigo; Maeby is punished for her bad grades.
title: arrested-development

description: An attempt to change the Bluth's image by hiring a publicist goes awry when the publicist falls for Michael; Tobias decides to return to Boston.
title: arrested-development

description: After Michael makes an impassioned speech about love, Marta realizes she has feelings for him, and Lindsay realizes that she wants a divorce.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael and Marta seek permission from Gob to elevate their relationship; Tobias faces his problem with nudity; George Sr. goes to his first hearing.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael faces a problem when he falls for his son's ethics teacher (Heather Graham).
title: arrested-development

description: Michael forces the family to get jobs after finding out they have been receiving paychecks without working; Buster and Gob's brawl at a construction site turns into a disaster.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael has a one-night stand with an attorney who turns out to be assigned to his father's case; Gob gets married on a dare; an undercover Security and Exchange Commission agent falls for George Sr.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael must decide between his father and his relationship with Maggie (Julia Louis-Dreyfus), when she unknowingly gives him his father's case file; Lindsay fights to have the Ten Commandments removed from the courthouse lawn.
title: arrested-development

description: Gob announces he will attempt his biggest trick ever and make a yacht disappear; Lindsay discovers her grandmother has died and Lucille pocketed her inheritance; Michael tries to fire Kitty.
title: arrested-development

description: George Sr.'s attempt to blackmail his accountant during Gob's bachelor party goes awry; Michael takes George-Michael on a fishing trip.
title: arrested-development

description: When the Securities and Exchange Commission releases some of the family's funds, Michael fields numerous requests for money.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael encourages Maeby to always tell the truth, then lies to the police about Kitty; Lindsay gets a job at a department store; Tobias gets a job as a security guard; Buster finally gets a chance to play soccer. Henry Winkler guest stars.
title: arrested-development

description: The family heads for the hospital when George Sr. has a heart attack, only to discover he is en route to Mexico with Kitty; a book Tobias wrote becomes a best seller; Buster and Annyong compete for women.
title: arrested-development

description: George Sr. remains at large, leaving Michael next in line to be prosecuted for the company's crimes; Lindsay and Tobias decide to have an open relationship, and Tobias auditions for Blue Man Group.
title: arrested-development

description: Gob agrees to be the company's figurehead while Michael pulls the strings, but the arrangement drives Michael crazy.
title: arrested-development
episodeTitle: The One Where They Build a House

description: The staircar turns up in Mexico, and Michael, increasingly frustrated, wants to find his fugitive father to give him a piece of his mind.
title: arrested-development

description: Lucille hires a bounty hunter (Malik Yoba) to find George Sr.; Gob tries to pull off an elaborate hoax; Maeby tries to set Lindsay up with the bounty hunter.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael is concerned that George Sr. will find out about Lucille's relationship with Oscar; Lindsay spends more time with Maeby to get closer to Steve Holt.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael must rebuild the banana stand after a prankster throws it into the bay; Gob fires everyone after an employee roasts him.
title: arrested-development

description: When the president of a rival company hires Gob in an effort to win the company softball game, Michael asks Gob to throw the game.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael sells some company stock to purchase a car, unaware that the rest of the family has sold off their stock as well, and they lose control of the firm in the process.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael reunites with his long-lost love, Sally Sitwell, only to have parents meddle in their romance; Lucille worries about who will bid on her in this year's bachelor auction, since Buster is dating someone.
title: arrested-development

description: The Bluths suspect that Lucille 2 (Liza Minnelli) is making a deal to sell the Bluth Co., so George Sr. suggests asking Uncle Jack (Martin Short) for help.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael thinks he may be the father of attorney Maggie Lizer's (Julia Louis-Dreyfus) baby, and that threatens his relationship with Sally (Christine Taylor).
title: arrested-development

description: The Bluths are shocked to discover that Buster's hand has been bitten off by a seal; Michael has to figure out whether Maggie's baby is really his or if it's just another lie.
title: arrested-development

description: When Lucille abducts George-Michael to take Buster's place at the annual mother-son dance, Michael and Buster try to save him and end up in a compromising position.
title: arrested-development

description: When George-Michael runs for student body president, Gob launches an offensive campaign that causes the students to revolt against George-Michael.
title: arrested-development

description: Gob and Buster team up to work on magic tricks using Buster's fake hand, aided by rival magician Tony Wonder (Ben Stiller).
title: arrested-development

description: When George Michael gives Ann a promise ring, Michael decides it is too much, too fast and decides to talk to her parents.
title: arrested-development

description: During spring break, Gob gets a chance to confront Phillip Litt (Zach Braff), the guy who mocked Gob's magic trick mistakes on a "Girls With Low Self-Esteem" video.
title: arrested-development

description: Shoddy plumbing forces Michael to call an inspector to check out the model home, but when he asks George Sr. to vacate the attic, Gob tries to help and chaos ensues.
title: arrested-development

description: When Michael decides to track down George Sr., he winds up in Reno and ruins a trip to the family cabin with his son.
title: arrested-development

description: When Michael goes to Britain to investigate his father's claims, he meets a beautiful Briton, Rita, and he asks her on a date.
title: arrested-development

description: When the Bluths invite Rita to a family party, they unknowingly expose to her Michael's lie that he has no family.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael misunderstands a word Rita (Charlize Theron) uses to describe him, so he sets out to prove her wrong by participating in manly activities.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael must ferret out a corporate mole to salvage a major real estate deal with Japanese investors; Tobias mistakes a CIA agent for a CAA agent and accidentally betrays the family.
title: arrested-development

description: George Sr. fears that Rita (Charlize Theron) is after Michael's money; Rita's uncle tries to stop the wedding by revealing surprising information.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael worries when he learns Lucille is dating the warden (guest star James Lipton) behind his father's back.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael and Gob team up to teach George Sr. a lesson; Lucille's biannual facelift inspires a new idea for a horror movie.
title: arrested-development

description: Concerned about its future, George Sr. insists that the family host a fundraiser to raise awareness within the community.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael plays the family lawyer in a mock trial; Buster pretends he is comatose; Lindsay fights for Buster's rights; George-Michael and Maeby marry.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael tracks down a woman who may be his sister; Tobias and Lindsay make separate dates with the same trainer.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael and Buster travel to Iraq; George-Michael throws Maeby a surprise party; a prosecutor tricks Tobias into giving him the family secrets.
title: arrested-development

description: Michael tries to keep the family from selling their shares of the stock; Lindsay uncovers a secret; George-Michael tells his father about his attraction to Maeby.
title: arrested-development
